name: Carol
placeOfBirth: Richardbury, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Carol is a hazel-eyed llama with silver hair, standing 156 cm tall. Originally from Richardbury, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Carol enjoys reading, singing, knitting. Known for their shy and energetic personality, Carol is a beloved member of the llama community.
